description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Copenhagen 2016
http://gotocph.com

Gregory Pelcha - Developer and technical lead at Universal Robots

ABSTRACT
The Robotics industry has been growing rapidly over the past few years with the introduction to 'cobots' (Collaborative Robots) as well as IoT. This growth has caused a need to move away from the classic industrial way of developing software solutions, to a more modern approach. [...]

Download slides and read the full abstract here:
https://gotocon.com/cph-2016/presentations/show_talk.jsp?oid=7760

https://www.facebook.com/GOTOConference

title: How to Survive in the Robotics Industry as a Software Developer
